lyrics.text: Lesson 28. No parking. First listen and then answer the question. What is Jasper White's
lyrics.translation: 第28课。禁止停车。首先听录音，然后回答问题。贾斯珀·怀特的是什么？

lyrics.text: problem? Jasper White is one of those rare people who believes in ancient myths. He has
lyrics.translation: 问题？贾斯珀·怀特是那种罕见的人之一，他相信古代神话。他有

lyrics.text: just bought a new house in the city, but ever since he moved in, he has had trouble with
lyrics.translation: 刚在城里买了一个新房子，但自从他搬进去后，他就遇到了麻烦

lyrics.text: cars and their owners. When he returns home at night, he always finds that someone has
lyrics.translation: 汽车和它们的主人。当他晚上回家时，他总是发现有人

lyrics.text: parked a car outside his gate. Because of this, he has not been able to get his own
lyrics.translation: 把车停在了他的大门外。因为这个原因，他一直无法得到自己的

lyrics.text: car into his garage even once. Jasper has put up no parking signs outside his gate,
lyrics.translation: 他甚至没有把车开进他的车库一次。贾斯珀在他的大门外竖起了禁止停车的标志，

lyrics.text: but these have not had any effect. Now he has put an ugly stone head over the gate.
lyrics.translation: 但这些都没有效果。现在他在大门上放了一个丑陋的石制头像。

lyrics.text: It is one of the ugliest faces I have ever seen. I asked him what it was, and he told me that it
lyrics.translation: 这是我见过的最丑陋的面孔之一。我问他那是什么，他告诉我那是

lyrics.text: was Medusa, the Gorgon. Jasper hopes that she will turn cars and their owners to stone,
lyrics.translation: 美杜莎，是戈尔贡。贾斯珀希望她会将汽车及其主人变成石头，

lyrics.text: but none of them have been turned to stone yet.
lyrics.translation: 但是它们还没有变成石头。
